#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<set>
#include<string>
#include<cmath>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<map>
#include<string.h>
//#include<utility>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,ans,n;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&n);
		ans=0;
		while(n)
		{
			ans^=n;
			n=n>>1;
		}	
		cout<<ans<<"\n";
	}		
}
